verbose_text: Based on previous studies in the SMNDelta7 mouse model of SMA, we have proposed a model in which selective degeneration of vulnerable SMA motor neurons requires the convergence of p53 stabilization with one or more additional events, which include post-translational modifications of p53 such as phosphorylation of its N-terminal TAD that specifically direct the p53 response toward degeneration (XREF_FIG).
